  1. /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. *
  3. * xid.c
  4. *      POSTGRES transaction identifier and command identifier datatypes.
  5. *
  6. * Portions Copyright (c) 1996-2024, PostgreSQL Global Development Group
  7. * Portions Copyright (c) 1994, Regents of the University of California
  8. *
  9. *
  10. * IDENTIFICATION
  11. *      src/backend/utils/adt/xid.c
  12. *
  13. *-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  14. */
  15. #include "postgres.h"

  17. #include <limits.h>

  19. #include "access/multixact.h"
  20. #include "access/transam.h"
  21. #include "access/xact.h"
  22. #include "common/int.h"
  23. #include "libpq/pqformat.h"
  24. #include "utils/builtins.h"
  25. #include "utils/xid8.h"

  27. ‌#define PG_GETARG_COMMANDID(n)        DatumGetCommandId(PG_GETARG_DATUM(n))
  28. ‌#define PG_RETURN_COMMANDID(x)        return CommandIdGetDatum(x)


  31. Datum
  32. ‌xidin(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  33. {
  34.     char       *str = PG_GETARG_CSTRING(0);
  35.     TransactionId result;

  37.     result = uint32in_subr(str, NULL, "xid", fcinfo->context);
  38.     PG_RETURN_TRANSACTIONID(result);
  39. }

  41. Datum
  42. ‌xidout(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  43. {
  44.     TransactionId transactionId = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  45.     char       *result = (char *) palloc(16);

  47.     snprintf(result, 16, "%lu", (unsigned long) transactionId);
  48.     PG_RETURN_CSTRING(result);
  49. }

  51. /*
  52. *        xidrecv            - converts external binary format to xid
  53. */
  54. Datum
  55. ‌xidrecv(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  56. {
  57.     StringInfo    buf = (StringInfo) PG_GETARG_POINTER(0);

  59.     PG_RETURN_TRANSACTIONID((TransactionId) pq_getmsgint(buf, sizeof(TransactionId)));
  60. }

  62. /*
  63. *        xidsend            - converts xid to binary format
  64. */
  65. Datum
  66. ‌xidsend(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  67. {
  68.     TransactionId arg1 = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  69.     StringInfoData buf;

  71.     pq_begintypsend(&buf);
  72.     pq_sendint32(&buf, arg1);
  73.     PG_RETURN_BYTEA_P(pq_endtypsend(&buf));
  74. }

  76. /*
  77. *        xideq            - are two xids equal?
  78. */
  79. Datum
  80. ‌xideq(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  81. {
  82.     TransactionId xid1 = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  83.     TransactionId xid2 = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(1);

  85.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(TransactionIdEquals(xid1, xid2));
  86. }

  88. /*
  89. *        xidneq            - are two xids different?
  90. */
  91. Datum
  92. ‌xidneq(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  93. {
  94.     TransactionId xid1 = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  95.     TransactionId xid2 = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(1);

  97.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(!TransactionIdEquals(xid1, xid2));
  98. }

  100. /*
  101. *        xid_age            - compute age of an XID (relative to latest stable xid)
  102. */
  103. Datum
  104. ‌xid_age(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  105. {
  106.     TransactionId xid = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  107.     TransactionId now = GetStableLatestTransactionId();

  109.     /* Permanent XIDs are always infinitely old */
  110.     if (!TransactionIdIsNormal(xid))
  111.         PG_RETURN_INT32(INT_MAX);

  113.     PG_RETURN_INT32((int32) (now - xid));
  114. }

  116. /*
  117. *        mxid_age            - compute age of a multi XID (relative to latest stable mxid)
  118. */
  119. Datum
  120. ‌mxid_age(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  121. {
  122.     TransactionId xid = PG_GETARG_TRANSACTIONID(0);
  123.     MultiXactId now = ReadNextMultiXactId();

  125.     if (!MultiXactIdIsValid(xid))
  126.         PG_RETURN_INT32(INT_MAX);

  128.     PG_RETURN_INT32((int32) (now - xid));
  129. }

  131. /*
  132. * xidComparator
  133. *        qsort comparison function for XIDs
  134. *
  135. * We can't use wraparound comparison for XIDs because that does not respect
  136. * the triangle inequality!  Any old sort order will do.
  137. */
  138. int
  139. ‌xidComparator(const void *arg1, const void *arg2)
  140. {
  141.     TransactionId xid1 = *(const TransactionId *) arg1;
  142.     TransactionId xid2 = *(const TransactionId *) arg2;

  144.     return pg_cmp_u32(xid1, xid2);
  145. }

  147. /*
  148. * xidLogicalComparator
  149. *        qsort comparison function for XIDs
  150. *
  151. * This is used to compare only XIDs from the same epoch (e.g. for backends
  152. * running at the same time). So there must be only normal XIDs, so there's
  153. * no issue with triangle inequality.
  154. */
  155. int
  156. ‌xidLogicalComparator(const void *arg1, const void *arg2)
  157. {
  158.     TransactionId xid1 = *(const TransactionId *) arg1;
  159.     TransactionId xid2 = *(const TransactionId *) arg2;

  161.     Assert(TransactionIdIsNormal(xid1));
  162.     Assert(TransactionIdIsNormal(xid2));

  164.     if (TransactionIdPrecedes(xid1, xid2))
  165.         return -1;

  167.     if (TransactionIdPrecedes(xid2, xid1))
  168.         return 1;

  170.     return 0;
  171. }

  173. Datum
  174. ‌xid8toxid(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  175. {
  176.     FullTransactionId fxid = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);

  178.     PG_RETURN_TRANSACTIONID(XidFromFullTransactionId(fxid));
  179. }

  181. Datum
  182. ‌xid8in(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  183. {
  184.     char       *str = PG_GETARG_CSTRING(0);
  185.     uint64        result;

  187.     result = uint64in_subr(str, NULL, "xid8", fcinfo->context);
  188.     PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(FullTransactionIdFromU64(result));
  189. }

  191. Datum
  192. ‌xid8out(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  193. {
  194.     FullTransactionId fxid = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  195.     char       *result = (char *) palloc(21);

  197.     snprintf(result, 21, UINT64_FORMAT, U64FromFullTransactionId(fxid));
  198.     PG_RETURN_CSTRING(result);
  199. }

  201. Datum
  202. ‌xid8recv(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  203. {
  204.     StringInfo    buf = (StringInfo) PG_GETARG_POINTER(0);
  205.     uint64        value;

  207.     value = (uint64) pq_getmsgint64(buf);
  208.     PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(FullTransactionIdFromU64(value));
  209. }

  211. Datum
  212. ‌xid8send(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  213. {
  214.     FullTransactionId arg1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  215.     StringInfoData buf;

  217.     pq_begintypsend(&buf);
  218.     pq_sendint64(&buf, (uint64) U64FromFullTransactionId(arg1));
  219.     PG_RETURN_BYTEA_P(pq_endtypsend(&buf));
  220. }

  222. Datum
  223. ‌xid8eq(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  224. {
  225.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  226.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  228.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(FullTransactionIdEquals(fxid1, fxid2));
  229. }

  231. Datum
  232. ‌xid8ne(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  233. {
  234.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  235.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  237.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(!FullTransactionIdEquals(fxid1, fxid2));
  238. }

  240. Datum
  241. ‌xid8lt(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  242. {
  243.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  244.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  246.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(FullTransactionIdPrecedes(fxid1, fxid2));
  247. }

  249. Datum
  250. ‌xid8gt(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  251. {
  252.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  253.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  255.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(FullTransactionIdFollows(fxid1, fxid2));
  256. }

  258. Datum
  259. ‌xid8le(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  260. {
  261.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  262.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  264.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(FullTransactionIdPrecedesOrEquals(fxid1, fxid2));
  265. }

  267. Datum
  268. ‌xid8ge(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  269. {
  270.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  271.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  273.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(FullTransactionIdFollowsOrEquals(fxid1, fxid2));
  274. }

  276. Datum
  277. ‌xid8cmp(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  278. {
  279.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  280.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  282.     if (FullTransactionIdFollows(fxid1, fxid2))
  283.         PG_RETURN_INT32(1);
  284.     else if (FullTransactionIdEquals(fxid1, fxid2))
  285.         PG_RETURN_INT32(0);
  286.     else
  287.         PG_RETURN_INT32(-1);
  288. }

  290. Datum
  291. ‌xid8_larger(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  292. {
  293.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  294.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  296.     if (FullTransactionIdFollows(fxid1, fxid2))
  297.         PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(fxid1);
  298.     else
  299.         PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(fxid2);
  300. }

  302. Datum
  303. ‌xid8_smaller(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  304. {
  305.     FullTransactionId fxid1 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(0);
  306.     FullTransactionId fxid2 = PG_GETARG_FULLTRANSACTIONID(1);

  308.     if (FullTransactionIdPrecedes(fxid1, fxid2))
  309.         PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(fxid1);
  310.     else
  311.         PG_RETURN_FULLTRANSACTIONID(fxid2);
  312. }

  314. /*****************************************************************************
  315. *     COMMAND IDENTIFIER ROUTINES                                             *
  316. *****************************************************************************/

  318. /*
  319. *        cidin    - converts CommandId to internal representation.
  320. */
  321. Datum
  322. ‌cidin(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  323. {
  324.     char       *str = PG_GETARG_CSTRING(0);
  325.     CommandId    result;

  327.     result = uint32in_subr(str, NULL, "cid", fcinfo->context);
  328.     PG_RETURN_COMMANDID(result);
  329. }

  331. /*
  332. *        cidout    - converts a cid to external representation.
  333. */
  334. Datum
  335. ‌cidout(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  336. {
  337.     CommandId    c = PG_GETARG_COMMANDID(0);
  338.     char       *result = (char *) palloc(16);

  340.     snprintf(result, 16, "%lu", (unsigned long) c);
  341.     PG_RETURN_CSTRING(result);
  342. }

  344. /*
  345. *        cidrecv            - converts external binary format to cid
  346. */
  347. Datum
  348. ‌cidrecv(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  349. {
  350.     StringInfo    buf = (StringInfo) PG_GETARG_POINTER(0);

  352.     PG_RETURN_COMMANDID((CommandId) pq_getmsgint(buf, sizeof(CommandId)));
  353. }

  355. /*
  356. *        cidsend            - converts cid to binary format
  357. */
  358. Datum
  359. ‌cidsend(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  360. {
  361.     CommandId    arg1 = PG_GETARG_COMMANDID(0);
  362.     StringInfoData buf;

  364.     pq_begintypsend(&buf);
  365.     pq_sendint32(&buf, arg1);
  366.     PG_RETURN_BYTEA_P(pq_endtypsend(&buf));
  367. }

  369. Datum
  370. ‌cideq(PG_FUNCTION_ARGS)
  371. {
  372.     CommandId    arg1 = PG_GETARG_COMMANDID(0);
  373.     CommandId    arg2 = PG_GETARG_COMMANDID(1);

  375.     PG_RETURN_BOOL(arg1 == arg2);
  376. }
